greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A325814(A228058(n)).
comment: First negative term occurs as a(16307) = -210973, with A228058(16307) = 1289925. The next negative terms occurs as a(20807) = -242901, with A228058(20807) = 1686825.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..25000
program: A228058list(up_to) = { my(v=vector(up_to), k=0, n=0); while(k<up_to, n++; if(isA228058(n), k++; v[k] = n)); (v); };
A034448(n) = { my(f=factorint(n)); prod(k=1, #f~, 1+(f[k, 1]^f[k, 2])); }; \\ After code in A034448
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 23 2019
